eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Otero, NM; AT 10:51 AM ON DEC 03, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:51 AM DEC 04, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
911 calls in Otero County, including Mescalero, are routing to Fort Bliss, TX.
For Police, Fire, or Medical emergencies, call 575-437-2210 until further notice.

TBRDA is working with the State to restore proper 911 service.
